page.title: 11IREBY COUNTRY FAIR
page.content: The Ireby Country Fair was introduced in 1975. The aim of the Fair is to turn back the clock and recreate a little of the past; to bring back the old crafts, traditions,sports and pastimes and, above all, the atmosphere of the last century; to bring together all those who would like to see tradition live on. The Fair is now held once every five years and on the last occasion in 1981 there were among other things, a Mock Hiring, Silver Band, a Meet of the Hunt, Craft Stalls and Displays, Morris Dancing, Sports, Old Time Music Hall and a Country Dance. Proceeds from the event are divided equally between village organisations and charity.
